Posts.Content: I need help. I must lose weight asap.I want to do it safely;however, I have non-hodgkins Lymphoma.Would apple cider vinegar pills be o.k. to use?--or is this contra-indicated since vinigar is acetic acid?????? Thank You,
Posts.Title: Maintaining Alkaline ph For Cancer Prevention
